attributes.additional_details: The current mental health system is failing a lot of British people and roughly around 10,000 people take their lives each year in the uk 25% of women and 75% of men each year, people are getting scared to ask for help because they isn’t a good system to help them so they are getting put in a waiting list for up to a year.
attributes.background: Get a better mental health system in the uk with more qualified therapists and workers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Increase funding for mental health services like counselling
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736864

Fund and Implement a 24/7 National Mental Health Crisis Response Service
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755098
